title: Caption competition: what are these North Koreans saying?
content: When it comes to photo-opportunities Kim Jong-un has certainly inherited his father's knack for looking distinctly underwhelmed while being shown mundane things – such as this vast spread of tasty snacks – by soldiers. It remains to be seen to what extent the Supreme Leader will emulate his forbear, but in the meantime you can participate in our caption competition. Be sure to specify which mouth the speech bubble should emerge from.
summary:
When it comes to photo-opportunities Kim Jong-un has certainly inherited his father's knack for looking distinctly underwhelmed while being shown mundane things – such as this vast spread of tasty snacks – by soldiers.
It remains to be seen to what extent the Supreme Leader will emulate his forbear, but in the meantime you can participate in our caption competition.
Be sure to specify which mouth the speech bubble should emerge from.
